column4: Yes but it's still FIREFOX..It's not like it is a totally different browser.
all settings will be saved, all bookmarks, etc.
I just think it's silly to have to wait on 9.10 in order to use an updated Firefox..
then why not the new versions of Gnome par6t way through? or KDE4 when it was released?  because they (the devs) decide what goes in and when
